extends java.lang.Object

                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Initializes a FileWriter, writes the lines from the list, and closes the file.
        Parameters:
        outFileName - Full file path and name. May not be null.
        list - List of String objects that are each a line in the file to be written.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - TODO
        java.io.IOException - TODO
        Postcondition:
        Out file is written and closed.
